hotel.name: Bellagio
hotel.cancelPolicies: Please be advised that all Terms and Conditions as defined on our site/services apply. For any concerns or questions, please contact us.
hotel.limitationPolicies:
• Suites include one king bed and allow for one rollaway.
  • Maximum stay: 14 nights
  • Minimum check-in age is 21 years
  • Children are charged as adults
  • Certain travel dates may require a minimum length of stay.
  • Name/date changes are not allowed over stop sell dates
  • No Shows and Early Departures are subject to 100% of the booking charges
  • All rooms non-smoking - smoking fee of $300 will be charged to guests who break the smoking policy (fee is subject to change)
  • A valid credit card or debit card is required upon arrival to register and a $150/night incidental deposit will be charged to guests (subject to change).
  • MGM Resorts Parking Terms & Conditions: All fees and policies are subject to change. An additional full-day parking fee (self or valet) will be charged for each additional day or fraction of a day over the first 24 hours (no grace period). The self-parking fees at each MGM Resorts property is NOT applicable during special event pricing. Parking fees may be higher during special events. For registered hotel guests, the 24 hour parking fee (self or valet) includes "in and out" privileges at the guest's originating MGM Resort property and also includes the same "in and out" parking privileges at any other MGM Resort property within the same 24 hour period, subject to availability. LOST TICKET: If a guest loses their self-parking ticket, MGM Resorts properties will attempt to determin how long the guest's vehicle has been parked at the facility. If the property can verify how long the guest has been parked, the guest will be charged for the actual amount of time parked. If the property cannot verify how long the guest has been parked, the guest will be subject to a lost ticket parking fee of $30 (fee subject to change).
hotel.description: The hotel rooms and suites at the Bellagio offer the perfect blend of beauty and elegance.
hotel.facilities:
• Air Conditioning
  • Hair Dryer
  • Iron & Ironing Board
  • Individual Climate Control
  • In-room safe
  • iPod docking station
  • Bathrobes
  • Desk
  • Cable TV
  • Free WiFi
  • Phone
  • A mandatory Daily Resort Fee is payable by guests directly at the hotel for both Package and Land Only (L/O) rate plans.
  • Resort fee includes:
    • Property-wide high speed internet acess (public spaces and in-room)
    • Unlimited local and toll free calls
    • Airline boarding pass printing
    • Notary service
    • Fitness center access for guests 18+

Effective January 31, 2018:

  • Self-Parking
    • 1 to 2 hours = $9
    • 2 to 4 hours = $15
    • 4 to 24 hours = $18
    • Over 24 hours = $18 each additional day or fraction of a day over the first 24 hour period
  • Valet Parking:
    • 0 to 2 hours = $21
    • 2 to 4 hours = $24
    • 4 to 24 hours = $30
    • Over 24 hours = $30 each additional day or fraction of a day over the first 24 hour period

*Parking fees subject to change. Vehicles that are self-parked for less than 1 hour will NOT be subject to a parking fee. For registered hotel guests, the 24 hour parking fee (self or valet) includes "in and out" privileges at the guest's originating MGM Resort property and also includes the same "in and out" parking privileges at any other MGM Resort property within the same 24 hour period, subject to availability.
hotel.recreation:
• Casino
  • Five outdoor pools, 4 spas and 52 private cabanas in a Mediterranean courtyard setting (seasonal)
  • Salon Bellagio: facials, manicures and pedicures
  • Spa Bellagio: massage therapies, hydrotherapy services and new unique body treatments, steam rooms, saunas, and an exercise room with Cybex equipment
  • "The Bank Nightclub at Bellagio"
  • "Hyde Bellagio"
  • Conservatory & Botanical Gardens
  • 2 casual dining restaurants and 5 quick eats outlets
  • Lago, an Italian restaurant by Julian Serrano (opening March 2015)
  • Two wedding chapels and Terrace of Dreams
  • "O™" Cirque du Soleil®
  • The Bellagio Gallery of Fine Art
  • Fine Shops & Boutiques at Via Bellagio
  • The Fountains of Bellagio
  • Golf at "Shadow Creek" - One of the nation's most exclusive and top rated golf courses.
  • Executive Suite Lounge, available to guests who book Bellagio Penthouse Suites, offers:
    • 7am - 11am, Continental Breakfast - Breakfast items include pastries, muffins, juices, coffee
    • 11am - 5pm, Afternoon Presentation - Variety of cookies, bread sticks, dried fruits, whole fruits
    • 5pm - 10 pm, Evening Presentation - Brioche, chocolate chip cookies, chocolate covered strawberries
    • Wi-Fi access
    • Laptops available
    • Faxing/Printing/Copying
    • Boarding pass printing
    • Line passes to Buffet & Cafe Bellagio
    • Show and Restaurant reservations with preferred seating
    • Floral arrangements upon request
    • Spa/Salon appointments
    • Nightclub VIP table reservations

hotel.name: New York-New York Hotel
hotel.cancelPolicies: Applicable cancellation fees are subject to change at time of cancellation. Please be advised that the cancellation policy listed is also subject to change without notice at any time. For any concerns regarding cancellation policies/fees please contact a Bonotel representative.
hotel.limitationPolicies:
• Maximum stay: 14 nights
  • Minimum check-in age is 21 years
  • Children are charged as adults
  • Certain travel dates may require a minimum length of stay.
  • Name/date changes are not allowed over stop sell dates
  • No Shows and Early Departures are subject to 100% of the booking charges
  • A valid credit card or debit card is required upon arrival to register and a $50/night incidental deposit will be charged to guests (subject to change).
  • MGM Resorts Parking Terms & Conditions: All fees and policies are subject to change. An additional full-day parking fee (self or valet) will be charged for each additional day or fraction of a day over the first 24 hours (no grace period). The self-parking fees at each MGM Resorts property is NOT applicable during special event pricing. Parking fees may be higher during special events. For registered hotel guests, the 24 hour parking fee (self or valet) includes "in and out" privileges at the guest's originating MGM Resort property and also includes the same "in and out" parking privileges at any other MGM Resort property within the same 24 hour period, subject to availability. LOST TICKET: If a guest loses their self-parking ticket, MGM Resorts properties will attempt to determin how long the guest's vehicle has been parked at the facility. If the property can verify how long the guest has been parked, the guest will be charged for the actual amount of time parked. If the property cannot verify how long the guest has been parked, the guest will be subject to a lost ticket parking fee of $30 (fee subject to change).
hotel.description: It's the center of everything you love about Las Vegas—with a distinctive New York-New York attitude! A valid credit card or debit card is required upon arrival to register and a $50/night incidental deposit will be charged to guests (subject to change). *A mandatory Daily Resort Fee is payable by guests directly at the hotel for both Package and Land Only (L/O) rate plans. Resort fee includes: Property-wide high speed internet access (public spaces and in-room), unlimited local and toll free calls, airline boarding pass printing, and fitness center access for guests 18+. All features and applicable charges are subject to change! Minimum check-in age is 21 years. Name/date changes are not allowed over stop sell dates. MGM Resorts Parking Terms & Conditions: A fee based parking program will be implemented. Vehicles that are self-parked for more than one hour will be subject to a parking fee. Effective January 31, 2018, the self-parking fee is $9 for vehicles parked over 1 hour to 2 hours, $12 for vehicles parked over 2 hours to 4 hours, and $15 for vehicles parked over 4 hours to 24 hours. For vehicles self-parked over 24 hours, there is an additional self-parking fee of $15 for each additional day or fraction of a day over the first 24 hours. The valet parking fee is $16 for the first 2 hours (no grace period), $18 for over 2 hours to 4 hours and $24 for over 4 hours to 24 hours. For vehicles that are valet parked over 24 hours, there is an additional valet parking fee of $24 for each additional day or fraction of a day over the first 24 hours (no grace period). All fees and policies are subject to change. An additional full-day parking fee (self or valet) will be charged for each additional day or fraction of a day over the first 24 hours (no grace period). The self-parking fees at each MGM Resorts property is NOT applicable during special event pricing. Parking fees may be higher during special events. For registered hotel guests, the 24 hour parking fee (self or valet) includes &apos;in and out' privileges at the guest's originating MGM Resort property and also includes the same 'in and out' parking privileges at any other MGM Resort property within the same 24 hour period, subject to availability. LOST TICKET: If a guest loses their self-parking ticket, MGM Resorts properties will attempt to determine how long the guest's vehicle has been parked at the facility. If the property can verify how long the guest has been parked, the guest will be charged for the actual amount of time parked. If the property cannot verify how long the guest has been parked, the guest will be subject to a lost ticket parking fee of $30 (fee subject to change).
hotel.facilities:
• 2,024 Guestrooms including suites
  • 24 hour room service
  • Personal, electronic safe
  • 24 hour room service
  • Hair dryer
  • Iron/Boards
  • Digital movies
  • Rollaway beds and cribs
  • AM/FM clock radio
  • Laundry/valet/dry cleaning
  • A mandatory Daily Resort Fee is payable by guests directly at the hotel for both Package and Land Only (L/O) rate plans.
  • Resort fee includes:
    • Property-wide high speed internet access (public spaces and in-room)
    • Unlimited local and toll free calls
    • Airline boarding pass printing
    • Fitness center access for guest 18+

Effective January 31, 2018:

  • Self-Parking
    • 1 to 2 hours = $9
    • 2 to 4 hours = $12
    • 4 to 24 hours = $15
    • Over 24 hours = $15 each additional day or fraction of a day over the first 24 hour period
  • Valet Parking:
    • 0 to 2 hours = $16
    • 2 to 4 hours = $18
    • 4 to 24 hours = $24
    • Over 24 hours = $24 each additional day or fraction of a day over the first 24 hour period

*Parking fees subject to change. Vehicles that are self-parked for less than 1 hour will NOT be subject to a parking fee. For registered hotel guests, the 24 hour parking fee (self or valet) includes "in and out" privileges at the guest's originating MGM Resort property and also includes the same "in and out" parking privileges at any other MGM Resort property within the same 24 hour period, subject to availability.
hotel.recreation:
• Casino
  • The Spa & Regis Signature Salon
  • Pool (seasonal)
  • The high speed Roller Coaster
  • Zumanity by Cirque du Soleil & Zumanity Boutique
  • Coyote Ugly Bar and Nightclub
  • Pour 24
  • Gallagher's Restaurant
  • Gonzalez y Gonzalez
  • Soho Village shopping
  • Nine Fine Irishmen
  • Mezzanine Shopping
  • Business Center
  • T-Mobile Arena

  • MGM Resorts Parking Terms & Conditions: All fees and policies are subject to change. An additional full-day parking fee (self or valet) will be charged for each additional day or fraction of a day over the first 24 hours (no grace period). hotel.description: Set amidst lush foliage, towering waterfalls and sparkling lagoons, The Mirage is a South Seas oasis, offering the serenity of the tropics and the excitement of Las Vegas. A valid credit card or debit card is required upon arrival to register and a $100/night incidental deposit will be charged to guests (subject to change). *A mandatory Daily Resort Fee  is payable by guests directly at the hotel for both Package and Land Only (L/O) rate plans. Resort fee includes: Property-wide high speed internet access (public spaces and in-room), unlimited local and toll free calls, airline boarding pass printing, notary service and fitness center access for guests 18+. All features and applicable charges are subject to change! Minimum check-in age is 21 years. Name/date changes are not allowed over stop sell dates. MGM Resorts Parking Terms & Conditions: A fee based parking program will be implemented. Vehicles that are self-parked for more than one hour will be subject to a parking fee. Effective January 31, 2018, the self-parking fee is $9 for vehicles parked over 1 hour to 2 hours, $12 for vehicles parked over 2 hours to 4 hours, and $15 for vehicles parked over 4 hours to 24 hours. For vehicles self-parked over 24 hours, there is an additional self-parking fee of $15 for each additional day or fraction of a day over the first 24 hours. The valet parking fee is $16 for the first 2 hours (no grace period), $18 for over 2 hours to 4 hours and $24 for over 4 hours to 24 hours. For vehicles that are valet parked over 24 hours, there is an additional valet parking fee of $24 for each additional day or fraction of a day over the first 24 hours (no grace period). All fees and policies are subject to change. An additional full-day parking fee (self or valet) will be charged for each additional day or fraction of a day over the first 24 hours (no grace period). The self-parking fees at each MGM Resorts property is NOT applicable during special event pricing. Parking fees may be higher during special events. For registered hotel guests, the 24 hour parking fee (self or valet) includes &apos;in and out' privileges at the guest's originating MGM Resort property and also includes the same 'in and out' parking privileges at any other MGM Resort property within the same 24 hour period, subject to availability. LOST TICKET: If a guest loses their self-parking ticket, MGM Resorts properties will attempt to determine how long the guest's vehicle has been parked at the facility. If the property can verify how long the guest has been parked, the guest will be charged for the actual amount of time parked. If the property cannot verify how long the guest has been parked, the guest will be subject to a lost ticket parking fee of $30 (fee subject to change).

hotel.name: The Majestic Yosemite Hotel
hotel.cancelPolicies: Applicable cancellation fees are subject to change at time of cancellation. Please be advised that the cancellation policy listed is also subject to change without notice at any time. For any concerns regarding cancellation policies/fees please contact a Bonotel representative.
hotel.limitationPolicies:
• Maximum stay is 7 nights.
  • No name or date changes allowed.
  • Early departures will be charged the full amount of original reservation.
  • No triple or quad occupancy available in Classic Room
  • The hotel is 100% non-smoking.
  • No units with air conditioning available.
  • No pets allowed.
  • Quiet hours are 10pm - 7am.
  • For road and weather information please call 209-372-0209.
  • It is recommended that you carry tire chains in your vehicle between November and April. Under state regulations, any vehicle entering a signed chain control area must carry chains, even if their use is not mandatory at the time.
  • Please note that 45' vehicles are prohibited on sections of Highways 120, 41, and 140 as designated by the California Department of Transportation (CALTRANS).
  • An entrance fee is required and is collected by the National Park Service at the park entrance stations. For bus entry information and permits please contact that National Park Service Office of Special Park Uses at 209-379-1851 or 209-379-1858. The following entrance fees are for a 7-day pass:
      • $30 per vehicle ($25 per vehicle from November through March) for non-commercial cars, pickup trucks, RV or van with 15 or fewer passenger seats (fee subject to change)
      • $20 per motorcycle (fee subject to change)
      • $15 per person ages 16 and up for pedestrians, anyone travelling on a bicycle, horse or non-commercial bus or van with more than 15 passenger seats (fee subject to change)
  • Bookings of 5 rooms or more will be considered a group booking and are not applicable to FIT rates.
  • Gas and diesel fuel are no longer available in Yosemite Valley. Fuels are available at service stations near park entrances and in Yosemite National Park at El Portal, Crane Flat and Big Trees Gas Stations.
  • Cooking is not allowed in guest rooms.
  • Please never leave food or scented items in your vehicle after dark. Bears are attracted to food and scented items (such as cosmetics, toiletries as well as empty food or beverage containers). Food can be stored in hotel rooms and hard-sided cabins, providing windows are closed when room is unoccupied. Due to bear activity, all food-related functions must be held inside a banquet room or at a designated picnic area.
hotel.description: The hotel's masterful facade of granite and concrete beams, stained to look like redwood, was designed to blend in with the surrounding forest and its natural setting.If you are visiting from November through April, you should expect chain requirements to be in effect (though it's possible you may not need to use chains), even if you only plan to visit Yosemite Valley and use the shuttle bus. Any time chain controls are in effect, all vehicles must have chains in possession, including four-wheel drive and rental vehicles.No name or date changes allowed. Bookings of 5 rooms or more will be considered a group booking and are not applicable to FIT rates.
hotel.facilities:
• Fresno is 60 miles from the south gate on Highway 41
  • 124 guestrooms
  • 85 Standard Rooms
  • Complimentary wireless Internet access
  • Complimentary self parking and valet parking
  • Bell service
  • Daily maid service with evening turndown
hotel.recreation:
• Tour desk and concierge service
  • Gift shop & Sweet shop
  • The Bar
  • The Dining Room
  • Heated swimming pool
  • Seasonal tennis courts
  • Hiking trails
  • Horseback riding, bicycle rental and other activities available for a fee
  • Business center
